analysis.key_quote: The blatant attempt to politicize the civil service will lead to a government staff that will have excessive turnover after every election, as newly-elected office holders will attempt to replace existing government staffers with “their people.”
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about employee protections, the integrity of the civil service, and the risks of politicization, which align with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
